timeline.bodyText: This looks curious.. is this intentional? Why?
timeline.author: vorburger

replies.bodyText: There is one of the two implimentations of the interface "LoanScheduleModelPeriod" (Disbursement period and Repayment Period).  These methods are not significant for Disbursement Period and needed only in Repayment Period, hence they are marked dummy.
replies.author: fynmanoj

replies.bodyText: @vorburger : We can move away from this abstraction and change all the usages in a subsequent PR if you feel it's appropriate. Merging it for now.
replies.author: avikganguly01
